name: Bith AI
description: Bith AI is an all-in-one AI-powered video editor that simplifies content creation, allowing users to generate, edit, and publish videos and images effortlessly.
longDescription: Bith AI is a web-based platform that leverages artificial intelligence to make video editing and content creation accessible to everyone, regardless of skill level. Its mission is to streamline the creative process by turning ideas into engaging visual content in seconds, addressing challenges like time-intensive editing and platform-specific formatting. The platform serves content creators, social media enthusiasts, and marketers by providing intuitive AI tools that automate complex tasks. Users can benefit from features like text-to-video generation and automatic resizing, which enhance productivity and creativity. Overall, Bith AI democratizes professional-grade video production, making it fun, fast, and efficient for daily use.
features: Magic Resizer automatically adjusts video dimensions from 16:9 to formats suitable for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and more, ensuring optimal compatibility and saving users time.
Text-to-Video AI generates engaging videos directly from text descriptions, enabling quick content creation for social media growth and idea realization.
Text-to-Image AI creates high-quality images from textual prompts in seconds, boosting creativity and providing assets for various projects.
Bith Studio offers easy editing tools to add text, images, videos, and effects to clips, delivering professional results with minimal effort.
Cloud-based processing allows users to access and edit clips from anywhere without needing powerful local hardware, focusing on creation rather than technical hurdles.
Watermark-free exports are available upon signing into a Bith TV account, ensuring clean and professional outputs for sharing.
AI-generated subtitles enhance video accessibility and viewer engagement by automatically adding captions.
Freemium model provides 100 credits for AI tools in the free plan, with options to upgrade for more advanced features and higher limits.
Intuitive interface supports beginners and professionals alike, making content creation straightforward and enjoyable.
Flexible subscription plans offer increased storage, credits, and priority support for heavy users.

faqs.question: What is Bith AI?
faqs.answer: Bith AI is an AI-driven video editor and generator that helps users create, edit, and enhance videos and images quickly. It uses advanced AI to simplify complex tasks for content creators.

faqs.question: Is Bith AI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bith AI offers a free plan with 100 credits for AI tools, limited storage, and basic features. Users can upgrade to paid plans for more credits and advanced capabilities.

faqs.question: How does the video resizer work?
faqs.answer: The magic resizer feature automatically converts videos to the required formats for different platforms like Instagram Reels or TikTok, ensuring perfect fit without manual adjustments.

faqs.question: Can I create videos from text?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Text-to-Video AI tool transforms text prompts into fully formed videos, ideal for rapid content production.

faqs.question: Does Bith AI add watermarks to exports?
faqs.answer: No, videos exported after signing into your account are free of watermarks, providing professional-quality results.

faqs.question: Is Bith AI suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, its user-friendly interface and AI automation make it easy for novices to produce high-quality content without prior experience.

faqs.question: What are the free plan limitations?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes a 250 MB upload limit, 2 GB storage, limited templates, and 100 AI credits. Paid plans expand these limits significantly.

faqs.question: Can I access Bith AI from any device?
faqs.answer: Yes, as a cloud-based platform, Bith AI is accessible from anywhere with an internet connection, without needing to download software.

faqs.question: Does Bith AI support subtitle generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features AI-powered subtitle creation to make videos more accessible and engaging for viewers.

faqs.question: How do I get more AI credits?
faqs.answer: Upgrade to a paid subscription to receive 1200 credits per month, along with enhanced features like higher storage and priority rendering.
